name: Exit a minor dungeon without dying
Discard Lance's Letter without reading it
Place all 6 hieroglyphs in their proper slot
Offend 2 women by jumping down in front of them
Open the secret door in Inca Ruins while the tile is not glowing
Die to a boss who is under 20 hp
Clear all enemies in a Mu room
Defeat a boss with a special ability
Have a full inventory while getting an item
Defeat all switch activated statues in Inca Ruins
Refuse to give food to a child
Grow all mushrooms in Mt. temple
